t.x: The art of expressing beauty visually. Includes painting, sculpture, design, etc.
e: I see art / fine arts.
Art / Fine Arts is beautiful.
Art / Fine Arts is an important form of art.
Understanding the aesthetic value of art / fine arts enriches art appreciation.

t.x: An image drawn on paper or canvas. A painted work.
e: I see picture / painting / drawing.
Picture / Painting / Drawing is beautiful.
Picture / Painting / Drawing is an important form of art.
Understanding the aesthetic value of picture / painting / drawing enriches art appreciation.

t.x: A three-dimensional art work made by carving or molding stone, wood, metal, etc.
e: I see sculpture.
Sculpture is beautiful.
Sculpture is an important form of art.
Understanding the aesthetic value of sculpture enriches art appreciation.

t.x: A space where art works are exhibited. Can appreciate paintings, sculptures, etc.
e: I see art museum / gallery.
Art Museum / Gallery is beautiful.
Art Museum / Gallery is an important form of art.
Understanding the aesthetic value of art museum / gallery enriches art appreciation.

t.x: A property visible to the eye depending on the wavelength of light. Red, blue, yellow, etc.
e: I see color.
Color is beautiful.
Color is an important form of art.
Understanding the aesthetic value of color enriches art appreciation.

t.x: The planning of form and function of products or works. Visual planning.
e: I see design.
Design is beautiful.
Design is an important form of art.
Understanding the aesthetic value of design enriches art appreciation.

t.x: A person who creates art works. Includes painters, sculptors, novelists, etc.
e: I see artist / creator.
Artist / Creator is beautiful.
Artist / Creator is an important form of art.
Understanding the aesthetic value of artist / creator enriches art appreciation.

t.x: An event where works are publicly displayed. Held at museums or galleries.
e: I see exhibition / exhibit.
Exhibition / Exhibit is beautiful.
Exhibition / Exhibit is an important form of art.
Understanding the aesthetic value of exhibition / exhibit enriches art appreciation.

t.x: Cloth or board for painting. Used for oil or acrylic paintings.
e: I see canvas.
Canvas is beautiful.
Canvas is an important form of art.
Understanding the aesthetic value of canvas enriches art appreciation.

t.x: A tool for painting or writing. Made of hair or fibers.
e: I see brush.
Brush is beautiful.
Brush is an important form of art.
Understanding the aesthetic value of brush enriches art appreciation.
